webwork-tex.statement:
{\bf 13. {\footnotesize (1 point) \path|Library/NAU/setDiscrete/RecurrReln_order2_square01.pg|}}\newline Find the solution to the following lhcc recurrence:\leavevmode\\\relax \(a_{n} = 38 a_{n-1} - 361 a_{n-2} \text{ for } n \geq 3\) with initial conditions \(a_1 = 646, a_2 = 18772\).
\leavevmode\\\relax
\(a_n =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}
\par
